attributes.action: Vote to stop £8million of Tax-payers money being spent on King’s Portrait idea.
attributes.additional_details: Stop wasting tax-payers money being spent unnecessarily on this frivolous portrait idea, and re-invest in the energy crisis to help small businesses survive the extortionate energy prices increase taking affect this April 1st 2023
attributes.background: Want the government to stop wasting tax payers money in this frivolous idea of having portrait of King Charles - £8million can be better spent on re-investing in the real problem of the rising cost of energy bills.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636089
